overview: "The Wiggles Nursery Rhymes!" includes your favourite nursery rhymes performed by The Wiggles, who use rhyme and rhythm, both critical aspects of language, which greatly facilitate children's success in learning to read. Playing with words, sounds and pace heightens children's literary development. Including counting and colours in multiple languages, this collection will be loved by children and parents alike!
title: The Wiggles - Nursery Rhymes
